io.spine.server.integration

Interface TransportFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryTransportFactory

    @SPI
public interface TransportFactory
    A factory for creating channel-based transport for Message inter-exchange between the current deployment component and other application parts. Inspired by Publish-Subscriber Channel pattern.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Publisher createPublisher(io.spine.type.MessageClass messageClass)
      Creates a Publisher for the messages of given class.
      Subscriber createSubscriber(io.spine.type.MessageClass messageClass)
      Creates a Subscriber for the messages of given class.

    • Method Detail

      • createPublisher

        Publisher createPublisher(io.spine.type.MessageClass messageClass)
        Creates a Publisher for the messages of given class.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - the class of messages that will be published via a created Publisher
        Returns:
        a new Publisher instance

      • createSubscriber

        Subscriber createSubscriber(io.spine.type.MessageClass messageClass)
        Creates a Subscriber for the messages of given class.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - the class of messages that will be received via a created Subscriber
        Returns:
        a new Subscriber instance
